drupalNodeEvent.title: How Chinese Netizens Use the Internet

field_description.processed: The stereotype of the Chinese Internet is that it functions as a "Great Firewall," intended to keep unauthorized information out. This one-sided view of information suppression overlooks the creative and dynamic ways that Chinese netizens navigate online platforms. In this webinar, two specialists will explore how netizens create content, react to government information, modify their own search behaviors, and actively shape Internet culture in China today.
